Relevant C++-core functions¶

Generate generalized small-world networks, including self-similar modular hierarchical and modified Kleinberg networks.”;

Lattice small-world generators¶

_modified_small_world_network(N, k, beta, …) Returns a variant of the Watts-Strogatz small world network model as a pair of (number_of_nodes, edge_list).
_modified_small_world_network_coord_lists(N, …) Returns a variant of the Watts-Strogatz small world network model as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates.
_original_small_world_network(N, k, p, …) Returns a Watts-Strogatz small world network as a pair of (number_of_nodes, edge_list).
_original_small_world_network_coord_lists(N, …) Returns a Watts-Strogatz small world network as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates.

Modular hierarchical generators¶

_modular_hierarchical_network(B, L, k, xi, …) Returns a self-similar modular hierarchical network as an edge list.
_modular_hierarchical_network_coord_lists(B, …) Returns a self-similar modular hierarchical network as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates.

Lattice Kleinberg generators¶

kleinberg_network(N, k, mu, …) Returns a 1d Kleinberg network (with periodic boundary conditions) as edge list.
kleinberg_network_coord_lists(N, k, mu, …) Returns a 1d Kleinberg network (with periodic boundary conditions) as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates.

Random geometric generators¶

_random_geometric_small_world_network(N, k, …) Returns a variant of the Watts-Strogatz small world network model as a pair of (number_of_nodes, edge_list).
_random_geometric_small_world_network_coord_lists(N, …) Returns a variant of the Watts-Strogatz small world network model as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates.
_random_geometric_kleinberg_network(N, k, …) Returns a 1d Kleinberg network (with periodic boundary conditions) as edge list where node positions are uniformly distributed in the real-valued interval [0,N].
_random_geometric_kleinberg_network_coord_lists(N, …) Returns a 1d Kleinberg network (with periodic boundary conditions) as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates, where node positions are uniformly distributed in the real-valued interval [0,N].
_twoD_random_geometric_kleinberg_network(N, …) Returns a 2d Kleinberg network (with or without periodic boundary conditions) as an edge list, where node positions are uniformly distributed in the real-valued unit square [0,1]^2.
_twoD_random_geometric_kleinberg_network_coord_lists(N, …) Returns a 2d Kleinberg network (with or without periodic boundary conditions) as lists of adjacency matrix coordinates, where node positions are uniformly distributed in the real-valued unit square [0,1]^2.

Helper functions¶

fast_gnp(N, p, start_node, seed) Returns a G(N,p) random graph in O(N+m) time as described by Batagelj and Brandes (in edge list format).
get_components(N, edge_list, int]]) Get a list of sets.
get_kleinberg_connection_probability(N, k, mu) get a list of connection probabilities by neighbor distance
